Subject: Leaver Guidance [OFFICIAL Internal Only]
Body:
Hi Rory,

 

Employee

 

I am sorry to hear that you will be leaving Ofgem, I will record your last day of service as 23 January 2022 and your last working day as 21 January 2022 – if this changes please let me know. 

 

If you plan to take any annual leave ahead of this date please book on MyHR and also let me know. 

 

This email and attached documents will guide you and your line manager through the leaver process and includes: 

 

*	Details on the Business Appointment Rules <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gov.uk%2Fguidance%2Fcrown-servants-new-jobs-and-business-appointments&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ccb4a586b76ef42b2c90408d9c4a61894%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637757040183922608%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=Rv366KKeqa%2F4Bwl56ADMV1xBIOTaLtf%2BHJBGnAf5%2B0s%3D&reserved=0>  (BAR) and guidance completion. This needs to be completed as soon as possible with your line manager and this is in addition to the form which is part of your leaver letter. 

 

*	Information on the knowledge capture process - this is to get an understanding of your current role, tasks, responsibilities and relationships and will help you organise your handover and notice period. If you need support with this, contact the Knowledge Management team (KnowledgeManagementTeam@ofgem.gov.uk <mailto:KnowledgeManagementTeam@ofgem.gov.uk> )

 

We will arrange a courier to collect your equipment following your last day at Ofgem. To allow us to do this, please ensure your address and contact details are up to date on MyHR as soon as possible. Please note: you must return your building pass with your IT equipment. 

 

Please see attached guidance on how to complete your Exit Questionnaire via MyHR, if you would like to arrange an Exit Interview in person please contact Michelle Craig the Business Partner for your directorate. 

 

I have recalculated your annual leave up to your last day of service, minus any days you have already taken. Below is your remaining balance to use ahead of your last day of service (privilege days are not included in this calculation): 

 

Pro-rata for leavers:

	
Current leave year start date

13/08/2021

Last day of service

23/01/2022

Annual leave entitlement

30

Carry over from previous year

6.5

Minus leave already taken

6

Pro-rated leave entitlement 

14.0

 

Line Manager 

 

As a member of your team is due to leave Ofgem there are a number of steps for you to follow, attached is the Leaver’s Checklist which will guide you through the process. This includes details on:

*	The Business Appointment Rules <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gov.uk%2Fguidance%2Fcrown-servants-new-jobs-and-business-appointments&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ccb4a586b76ef42b2c90408d9c4a61894%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637757040183932601%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=BL0qtmIowGl0iQO9zV6jXrhswak4ieNA6dRMNcXMonQ%3D&reserved=0>  (BAR): please complete the application with the employee if required. If the BAR is not required please email me to confirm this. 
*	Knowledge Capture: please discuss this with your leaver to ensure a smooth handover
*	Return of Property: please ensure your leaver returns all Ofgem property to you or the relevant department ahead of their last day in the office. 

If you have any questions at all, please let me know.

Many thanks,
